name: Userstyles Inspired Dark
description: A userstyles website/forums dark style, that attempts to refine coverage throughout the website and forums. Note: Areas like forums administrator/moderator panels are likely somewhat unstyled. Tested in Firefox , Google Chrome, Opera with Openstyles Stylus. Feedback is welcome and appreciated =). ■ Install as UserCSS (Stylus Users) click here. To view the project page click here. To report any issue(s) click here. Sites Covered ■ https://userstyles.org ■ https://forum.userstyles.org
